entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 11:45 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 late this evening then light before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
